text: Hi Mahira!! Sorry for my late reply, has been quite busy weeks as I’m finishing the project and had to do some tests and interviews for other studios. Now I’m waiting for a reply, so fingers crossed! I will have to continue and apply for studios!

yeah they have great books and is not too expensive! I started ZBrush in Ireand through a Skillnet Animation course where I attended five lessons to learn the basis of the software! the teacher was awesome and that was enough to understand the interface and be able to continue now by myself
I would suggest you to download Blender as it’s open source and you can sculpt (like in ZBrush)
plus is used by the industry and you can find tutorials online! it’s definitely one of the best tools for free you can learn and ‘sell’ to a company to get a job!:)
